document_data.caption: A map showing the Bloody Roger (labeled #7) in northeast Luthcheq.
document_data.name: The Bloody Roger
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bloody Roger''' was an [[inn]] located in the capital city of [[Luthcheq]] in [[Chessenta]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4420 Luthcheq}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located in northeast Luthcheq near the docks and the coast of the [[Bay of Chessenta]]. It sat next door to a trading center.
